item.description:
PCYC REGATTA ~ SPEAKER NIGHT

Speaker: Brad White from NORTH SAILS

TOPIC - MAINSAIL TRIM

Taming the mainsail in big breeze is the best way to assist the person on the helm and keep the boat performing optimally. Whether youâ€™re an avid racer or weekend cruiser, knowing how to properly trim the mainsail in various weather conditions is important. So come join fellow sailors and learn the ins and outs of mainsail trim from one of the top sailors in New England.

Wednesday, March 20, 2013
6 PM Cocktails
7 PM Presentation
